title: Market share of the global luggage market 2015 , by company
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 17.3 is found at Company Samsonite International SA and the minimum is found at Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd where Company is 0.6.
There is a difference of 16.7 between the maximum Company Samsonite International SA and minimum Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 17.3 is found at Company Samsonite International SA and the minimum is found at Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd where Company is 0.6.
Company LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA has the second highest value for Market share.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Company is 16.7.

The Company Samsonite International SA has the highest Market share, followed by LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA, and Delsey SA. Down to the Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd which is the lowest.
Similar Market share is found in Company VF Corp, and Tumi Holdings Inc.
The Company Samsonite International SA tends to be 5.34 percent higher than average.
The Market share is 32.4 if we add up values of all Companys.
